channel.title: SMF 99 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 99 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 99 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Samples Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF99_SDEF_MAP SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP SMF99_S1_SDEF_MAP SMF99_S1_SS_MAP SMF99_S1_PP_MAP SMF99_S1_SL_MAP SMF99_ONE_CURVE_POINT_MAP SMF99_S1_BP_MAP SMF99_S1_AAT_MAP PRIORITY_TABLE_ENTRY_SECTION SMF99_S1_RG_MAP SMF99_S1_GR_MAP SMF99_S1_SLT_MAP PRIORITY_TABLE_ENTRY_SECTION_ZAAP SMF99_S1_ZE_MAP PRIORITY_TABLE_ENTRY_SECTION_ZIIP SMF99_ONE_CURVE_POINT_MAP Samples Name Description capacity_factors Request capacity and max capacity factors for CP, zIIP and zAAP. contention_analysis Request for contention analysis, so the features match them for the Machine Learning Model cp_service Request CP service consumption per importance level cp_usage_and_trickels Request CP usage and trickels.

item.title: SMF 99 Subtype 2
item.description: How to use this documentation? Samples Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF99_SDEF_MAP SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP SMF99_S2_SDEF_MAP SMF99_S2_CLS_MAP SMF99_S2_PER_MAP SMF99_S2_ECD_MAP SMF99_XMEM_MAP SMF99_SERVER_MAP SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP SMF99_SDATA_MAP SMF99_QDATA_MAP SMF99_IOSUB_SAMPLES_MAP SMF99_SPECRPT SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Samples Name Description cics_ims Request the necessary columns for cics/ims workload analysis. io_samples Request IO samples for service class. response_time Request sampling information for response time distribution. smf_99_02_sample Request for commonly used SMF 99 Subtype 2 data. srv_samples Request sampling information for service class.

item.title: SMF 99 Subtype 6
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF99_SDEF_MAP SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP SMF99_S6_SDEF_MAP SMF99_S6_PER_MAP SMF99_S6_SERVER_MAP Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format date SMF99DTE Date of Record date time SMF99TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp len SMF99LEN Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word).

item.title: SMF 99 Subtype 12

Samples Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF99_SDEF_MAP SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP SMF99_S12_SDEF_MAP SMF99_S12_HD_INT_HDR_MAP SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP SMF99_S12_HD_INT_PROC_MAP Samples Name Description hiper_dispatch Request hiper dispatch information per processor type. Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp cpu_type hd_int_cap_proctype SMF99.12 capacity data processor type @ME14601A vcm_lparcpshare vcm_lparflags These flags represent the status of the physical CPU/Core share compar… hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity mvs_busy vcm_mvsbusythrunpark cec_free_capacity Less than 25% of CP free, no unparking hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl vcm_diagincrdiscruprequ

item.title: Field - act_sr
item.description: Service rate received in last interval on the local system Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_ACT_SR Description Service rate received in last interval on the local system

item.title: Field - affinity_nodes_rebuild
item.description: rebuild affinity nodes Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description rebuild affinity nodes Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field vcm_flag1.

item.title: Field - ams2
item.description: Critical Aux shortage exists Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: short_flags Description Critical Aux shortage exists Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field short_flags.

item.title: Field - an_cap
item.description: capacity of affinity node in microseconds Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CAP Description capacity of affinity node in microseconds

item.title: Field - an_ci_flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description an_ci_notopoinfo 0 No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl1
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 1 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL1 Description Container ID of nesting level 1

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl2
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 2 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL2 Description Container ID of nesting level 2

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl3
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 3 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL3 Description Container ID of nesting level 3

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl4
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 4 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL4 Description Container ID of nesting level 4

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl5
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 5 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL5 Description Container ID of nesting level 5

item.title: Field - an_ci_nlinuse
item.description: Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_AN_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_AN_CI_NL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NLINUSE Description Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_AN_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_AN_CI_NL

item.title: Field - an_ci_notopoinfo
item.description: No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: an_ci_flags Description No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field an_ci_flags.

item.title: Field - an_flags
item.description: flags Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_FLAGS Description flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_an_bdycrossing 0 CPs on this node are boundary crossing. vcm_an_hnsbdycrossing 1 Helper nodes are boundary crossing.

item.title: Field - an_polarhi
item.description: Number of VHs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARHI Description Number of VHs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - an_polarlow
item.description: Number of VLs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARLOW Description Number of VLs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - an_polarmed
item.description: Number of VMs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARMED Description Number of VMs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - as_ba_brkloc
item.description: HiperDispatch breakup location information Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_BRKLOC Description HiperDispatch breakup location information

item.title: Field - as_ba_brklocelm
item.description: Location element for each processor type which describes the breakup environment or 0 Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_BRKLOCELM Description Location element for each processor type which describes the breakup environment or 0

item.title: Field - as_ba_flags
item.description: HiperDispatch flag areaBit Meaning 0 Address space is a high storage consumer. 1-7 Reserved Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_FLAGS Description HiperDispatch flag areaBit Meaning 0 Address space is a high storage consumer. 1-7 Reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description as_ba_highstorageconsumer 0 ON: address space is high storage consumer

item.title: Field - as_ba_highstorageconsumer
item.description: ON: address space is high storage consumer Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_ba_flags Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field as_ba_flags.

item.title: Field - as_ba_loc
item.description: HiperDispatch processor topology location information Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_LOC Description HiperDispatch processor topology location information

item.title: Field - as_ba_locelm
item.description: Location element for each processor type or 0 Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_LOCELM Description Location element for each processor type or 0

item.title: Field - as_ba_memscore
item.description: Memory score Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_BA_MEMSCORE Description Memory score

item.title: Field - as_boost
item.description: Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field as_esp_flags.

item.title: Field - as_cpsrp_cur_fp_samp
item.description: Amount of IRACPSRP samples running with full preemption Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_CPSRP_CUR_FP_SAMP Description Amount of IRACPSRP samples running with full preemption

item.title: Field - as_cpsrp_prev_fp_samp
item.description: Previous value of FULL_PRE1 Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_CPSRP_PREV_FP_SAMP Description Previous value of FULL_PRE1

item.title: Field - as_cpsrp_samp
item.description: One sample per IRACPSRP invocation (every 50ms) Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_CPSRP_SAMP Description One sample per IRACPSRP invocation (every 50ms)

item.title: Field - as_cpu_service
item.description: Total CPU service units for the address space - OUCBCPU Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_CPU_SERVICE Description Total CPU service units for the address space - OUCBCPU

item.title: Field - as_disp_count
item.description: Dispatchable count: the number of times that this address space has been found in subroutine CPUTLCK to be dispatchable yet no CPU time has accumulated for it - OUXBDSCN Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_DISP_COUNT Description Dispatchable count: the number of times that this address space has been found in subroutine CPUTLCK to be dispatchable yet no CPU time has accumulated for it - OUXBDSCN

item.title: Field - as_enclave_cpu_service
item.description: Accumulated CPU service of completed enclaves owned by this space - OUCBECPU Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_CPU_SERVICE Description Accumulated CPU service of completed enclaves owned by this space - OUCBECPU

item.title: Field - as_enclave_ifa_time
item.description: Total IFA time for the enclaves owned by the address space OucbxEncTim eOnPro(pro_ifa) Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_IFA_TIME Description Total IFA time for the enclaves owned by the address space OucbxEncTim eOnPro(pro_ifa)

item.title: Field - as_enclave_ifacp_time
item.description: Total IFA time spent on CP for the enclaves owned by the address space - OucbxEncTimeProOnCP(pro_ifa) Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_IFACP_TIME Description Total IFA time spent on CP for the enclaves owned by the address space - OucbxEncTimeProOnCP(pro_ifa)

item.title: Field - as_enclave_sup_time
item.description: Total SUP time for the enclaves owned by the address space OucbxEncTim eOnPro(pro_sup) Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_SUP_TIME Description Total SUP time for the enclaves owned by the address space OucbxEncTim eOnPro(pro_sup)

item.title: Field - as_enclave_supcp_time
item.description: Total SUP time spent on CP for the enclaves owned by the address space - OucbxEncTimeProOnCP(pro_sup) Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_SUPCP_TIME Description Total SUP time spent on CP for the enclaves owned by the address space - OucbxEncTimeProOnCP(pro_sup)

item.title: Field - as_enclave_time
item.description: Accumulate tx active time of completed enclaves owned by this space - OUCBETIM Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ENCLAVE_TIME Description Accumulate tx active time of completed enclaves owned by this space - OUCBETIM

item.title: Field - as_esp_anam
item.description: Address space name Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_ANAM Description Address space name

item.title: Field - as_esp_ap
item.description: expanded storage access policy for demand Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_AP Description expanded storage access policy for demand

item.title: Field - as_esp_asid
item.description: Address Space ID number Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_ASID Description Address Space ID number

item.title: Field - as_esp_cs_fmct
item.description: Number of central storage frames the address spaces owns Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_CS_FMCT Description Number of central storage frames the address spaces owns

item.title: Field - as_esp_es_fmct
item.description: Number of expanded storage frames the address spaces owns Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_ES_FMCT Description Number of expanded storage frames the address spaces owns

item.title: Field - as_esp_flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description as_stg_protected_now 0 Storage is protected at this instant as_stgcrit_explicit 1 Storage protected assigned to space by classification rule as_managed_to_region_goals 2 Address space is currently manged to region’s goal rather than transaction server’s goal as_non_swappable 3 Address space is non swappable as_managed_to_both_goals 4 Address space is currently managed to both region’s and transaction server’s goal as_inelighonorpriority 5 Address space is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.

item.title: Field - as_esp_hp
item.description: expanded storage access policy for hiperspace Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_HP Description expanded storage access policy for hiperspace

item.title: Field - as_esp_pps_tar
item.description: Address space protective process storage target. Note see subtype 5 for other targets. This is the only target non-monitor address spaces can have. Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_PPS_TAR Description Address space protective process storage target. Note see subtype 5 for other targets. This is the only target non-monitor address spaces can have.

item.title: Field - as_esp_vp
item.description: expanded storage access policy for VIO Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_ESP_VP Description expanded storage access policy for VIO

item.title: Field - as_healthind
item.description: Health indicator Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_HEALTHIND Description Health indicator

item.title: Field - as_ifa_service
item.description: Total IFA service units for the address space - Oucbx_Time_On_Pro(pro_ifa) descaled Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_IFA_SERVICE Description Total IFA service units for the address space - Oucbx_Time_On_Pro(pro_ifa) descaled

item.title: Field - as_ifacp_service
item.description: Total IFA service units spent on CP for the address space - Oucbx_Time_- Pro_On_CP(pro_ifa) descaled Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_IFACP_SERVICE Description Total IFA service units spent on CP for the address space - Oucbx_Time_- Pro_On_CP(pro_ifa) descaled

item.title: Field - as_inelighonorpriority
item.description: Address space is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. work will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Address space is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. work will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field as_esp_flags.

item.title: Field - as_io_service
item.description: Total IO service units for the address space - OUCBIOC Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_IO_SERVICE Description Total IO service units for the address space - OUCBIOC

item.title: Field - as_managed_to_both_goals
item.description: Address space is currently managed to both region’s and transaction server’s goal Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Address space is currently managed to both region’s and transaction server’s goal Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field as_esp_flags.

item.title: Field - as_managed_to_region_goals
item.description: Address space is currently manged to region’s goal rather than transaction server’s goal Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Address space is currently manged to region’s goal rather than transaction server’s goal Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field as_esp_flags.

item.title: Field - as_mp_actual_pool
item.description: The actual memory pool of the address space Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_MP_ACTUAL_POOL Description The actual memory pool of the address space

item.title: Field - as_mp_requested_pool
item.description: The user requested memory pool. Can differ from actual_pool due to RSM constraints Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_MP_REQUESTED_POOL Description The user requested memory pool. Can differ from actual_pool due to RSM constraints

item.title: Field - as_mso_service
item.description: Total MSO service units for the address space - OUCBMSO Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_MSO_SERVICE Description Total MSO service units for the address space - OUCBMSO

item.title: Field - as_non_swappable
item.description: Address space is non swappable Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Address space is non swappable Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field as_esp_flags.

item.description: Transaction service units on standard CP reported for PBs running in this address space - OucbxPBCP Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_PB_SERVICE Description Transaction service units on standard CP reported for PBs running in this address space - OucbxPBCP

item.description: Transaction service units on zCBP reported for PBs running in this address space - OucbxPBzCBP Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_PB_ZCBP_SERVICE Description Transaction service units on zCBP reported for PBs running in this address space - OucbxPBzCBP

item.description: Total SRB service units for the address space - OUCBSRB Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_SRB_SERVICE Description Total SRB service units for the address space - OUCBSRB

item.description: Storage is protected at this instant Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Storage is protected at this instant Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field as_esp_flags.

item.description: Storage protected assigned to space by classification rule Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: as_esp_flags Description Storage protected assigned to space by classification rule Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field as_esp_flags.

item.description: Total SUP service units for the address space - Oucbx_Time_On_Pro(pro_sup) descaled Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_SUP_SERVICE Description Total SUP service units for the address space - Oucbx_Time_On_Pro(pro_sup) descaled

item.description: Total service units for the address space - OUCBWMS Map: SMF99_AS_ESP_MAP Based on: SMF99_AS_TOTAL_SERVICE Description Total service units for the address space - OUCBWMS

item.title: Field - c_vcm_lparcpshare
item.description: These flags represent the status of the physical CPU/Core share compared to the available VHs and VMs Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_LPARCPSHARE Description These flags represent the status of the physical CPU/Core share compared to the available VHs and VMs Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description c_vcm_lparcpshareok 3 The physical CPU/Core share matches the number and polarization of the CPUs/Cores passed by the topology information c_vcm_lparcpsharehi 4 The physical CPU/Core share is higher than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info c_vcm_lparcpsharelo 5 The physical CPU/Core share is lower than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info

item.title: Field - c_vcm_lparcpsharehi
item.description: The physical CPU/Core share is higher than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: c_vcm_lparcpshare Description The physical CPU/Core share is higher than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field c_vcm_lparcpshare.

item.title: Field - c_vcm_lparcpsharelo
item.description: The physical CPU/Core share is lower than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: c_vcm_lparcpshare Description The physical CPU/Core share is lower than the number of VHs and VMs passed by the topology info Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field c_vcm_lparcpshare.

item.title: Field - c_vcm_lparcpshareok
item.description: The physical CPU/Core share matches the number and polarization of the CPUs/Cores passed by the topology information Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: c_vcm_lparcpshare Description The physical CPU/Core share matches the number and polarization of the CPUs/Cores passed by the topology information Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field c_vcm_lparcpshare.

item.title: Sample - capacity_factors
item.description: Request capacity and max capacity factors for CP, zIIP and zAAP. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format ziip_max_fac processed SMF99_MCF_ZIIP Not available integer cp_cap_fac processed SMF99_CF Capacity factor for CPs scaled by 1024 integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter). string zaap_cap_fac processed SMF99_CF_ZAAP Not available integer cp_max_fac processed SMF99_MCF Not available integer timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp ziip_cap_fac processed SMF99_CF_ZIIP Not available integer zaap_max_fac processed SMF99_MCF_ZAAP Not available integer

item.title: Field - capws

item.title: Field - cccittsh
item.description: Blocked workload, length of initial task time slice high value Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCCITTSH Description Blocked workload, length of initial task time slice high value

item.title: Field - cccttsh
item.description: Blocked workload, length of major time slice, means length of trickle Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCCTTSH Description Blocked workload, length of major time slice, means length of trickle

item.title: Field - cctinthd
item.description: Blocked workload, OPT parameter BLWLINTHD for starvation threshold Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCTINTHD Description Blocked workload, OPT parameter BLWLINTHD for starvation threshold

item.title: Field - cctrc100
item.description: Blocked workload, number of times CP utilization is = 100 % in the current interval Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCTRC100 Description Blocked workload, number of times CP utilization is = 100 % in the current interval

item.description: Blocked workload, number of addr.space/ enclaves waiting longer than the threshold Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCTRCWTR Description Blocked workload, number of addr.space/ enclaves waiting longer than the threshold

item.description: Blocked workload, OPT parameter BLWLTRPCT for percentage of cp trickling Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_CCTTRPCT Description Blocked workload, OPT parameter BLWLTRPCT for percentage of cp trickling

item.description: CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPUSEDADJ Description CEC capacity used in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.description: Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECCAPFREE Description Free CEC capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM interval length

item.title: Field - cec_utilization
item.description: Total CEC utilization, scaled by 256 Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: SMF99C_VCM_CECUTIL Description Total CEC utilization, scaled by 256 Post-Processed The value is scaled by 25600.

item.title: Sample - cics_ims
item.description: Request the necessary columns for cics/ims workload analysis. Description Columns renamed and converted to string or boolean output: - cpu_critical Indicates whether the period is CPU critical or not. - stgcrit_implicit Indicates whether the period belongs to a service class that was assigned storage protection (storage critical). The service class was used in subsystem type CICS® or IMS and the rule specified storage critical = yes. - pserver_type_name Describes the type of the server associated with the record, based on the bits in the field ‘pserver_type’.

item.title: Field - class_period
item.description: service class name and period Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: srv_class_name, period_num Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return srv_class_name +'.' + period_num

item.title: Field - cln
item.description: Length of class information Map: SMF99_S2_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF992CLN Description Length of class information

item.description: DASD I/O contention delta samples for the current interval Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_CNTD_IOSM_CURR Description DASD I/O contention delta samples for the current interval

item.description: Offset to class information from beginning of record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_S2_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF992COF Description Offset to class information from beginning of record (including RDW)

item.description: Number of class information Map: SMF99_S2_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF992CON Description Number of class information

item.title: Sample - contention_analysis
item.description: Request for contention analysis, so the features match them for the Machine Learning Model Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format cap_cec SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_CEC_RELATED Free LPAR capacity which is the total of what is always available to the LPAR and the portion of the unused capacity of the CEC integer cp_imp2 virtual alias ilsu_array[2] CP service consumption for importance level 2 ziip_imp1 virtual alias ilsu_ziip_array[1] zIIP service consumption for importance level 1 uic3 SMF99_UIC3 Frames in uic bucket 3 integer ziip_max_fac processed SMF99_MCF_ZIIP Not available integer cp_dispatch_time SMF99_DELTADISPTIME LPAR CP Dispatch Time integer lpar_busy_time_ziip SMF99_LPARBUSYTIME_ZIIP Not available integer cap_lcp SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_LCP_CONFIG Free LPAR capacity based on the configured LCPs integer cp_imp3 virtual alias ilsu_array[3] CP service consumption for importance level 3 ifac_uncapped SMF99_SU_IFACTOR_UNCAPPED Uncapped Service unit inflation factor (reg.

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl4
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 4 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL4 Description Container ID of nesting level 4

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nlinuse
item.description: Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_CP_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_CP_CI_NL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NLINUSE Description Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_CP_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_CP_CI_NL Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 STISI_15_1_20 1 STISI_15_1_2 2 STISI_15_1_3 3 STISI_15_1_4 4 STISI_15_1_4 default STISI_15_1_5

item.title: Field - cp_cputype
item.description: CPU/Core type Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CPUTYPE Description CPU/Core type Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 CP 5 zIIP default unknown

item.title: Field - cp_disc
item.description: CP service consumption for importance discretionary Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: ilsu_array[6] Description Description of the array: A single entry in the array of Importance Level Service Units, containing the number of Service Units consumed by work at this Importance Level (or unused) over the last ten seconds. The entries are indexed with an origin of zero so that the index matches the Importance Level to which the entry pertains. Post-Processed This field is an alias for ilsu_array[6].

Name Based on Description Type/Format cp_imp5 virtual alias ilsu_array[5] CP service consumption for importance level 5 cp_free virtual alias ilsu_array[7] CP free service capacity cp_sys virtual alias ilsu_array[0] CP service consumption for importance sys cp_imp2 virtual alias ilsu_array[2] CP service consumption for importance level 2 cp_disc virtual alias ilsu_array[6] CP service consumption for importance discretionary sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - cp_sys
item.description: CP service consumption for importance sys Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: ilsu_array[0] Description Description of the array: A single entry in the array of Importance Level Service Units, containing the number of Service Units consumed by work at this Importance Level (or unused) over the last ten seconds. The entries are indexed with an origin of zero so that the index matches the Importance Level to which the entry pertains. Post-Processed This field is an alias for ilsu_array[0].

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description needs_sysplex_help 0 Period experienced some type of delay within the sysplex during last policy adjustment interval cpu_critical 1 Period is cpu critical stgcrit_implicit 2 period belongs to a service class that was assigned storage protection (stg critical) in the active service policy. The service class was used in subsystem type CICS or IMS and the rule specified storage critical = yes.

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ewlm_managed 0 Period is managed using EWLM performance data. io_priority_group 1 Period belongs to a service class that was assigned to I/O priority group inelighonorpriority 2 Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing.

item.title: Field - flags2
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_FLAGS2 Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description inelighonorpriority 0 Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. iscappedbytrg 1 At least one TRG with a capacity maximum is associated with this period iscappedbysoletrg 2 Exactly one TRG with a capacity maximum is associated with this period cpucrit_implicit 3 Service class period implicitly designated CPU critical

item.title: Field - flg

item.title: Sample - free_cp_cap
item.description: Request free capacity for CP. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format cap_guar SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_GUARANTEED Free LPAR capacity which is always available based on the LPAR weight integer cap_cec SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_CEC_RELATED Free LPAR capacity which is the total of what is always available to the LPAR and the portion of the unused capacity of the CEC integer cp_free virtual alias ilsu_array[7] CP free service capacity cap_wait SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_WT_RELATED Free LPAR capacity based on the accumulated logical CPU wait times integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - free_lpar_capacity_ub_cpu
item.description: For IBM use only Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_UB_CPU Description For IBM use only

item.title: Field - free_lpar_capacity_ub_ziip
item.description: For IBM use only Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_UB_ZIIP Description For IBM use only

item.title: Sample - free_zaap_cap
item.description: Request free capacity for zAAP Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format cap_cec_zaap SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_CEC_RELATD_ZAAP Free zAAP LPAR capacity which is the total of what is always available to the LPAR and the portion of the unused zAAP capacity of the CEC integer cap_wait_zaap SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_WT_RELATED_ZAAP Free zAAP LPAR capacity based on the accumulated logical zAAP wait times integer cap_guar_zaap SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_GUARANTEED_ZAAP Free zAAP LPAR capacity which is always available based on the zAAP LPAR weight integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Sample - free_ziip_cap
item.description: Request free capacity for zIIP. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format ziip_free virtual alias ilsu_ziip_array[7] zIIP free service capacity cap_cec_ziip SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_CEC_RELATD_ZIIP Free zIIP LPAR capacity which is the total of what is always available to the LPAR and the portion of the unused zIIP capacity of the CEC integer cap_guar_ziip SMF99_FREE_LPAR_CAPACITY_GUARANTEED_ZIIP Free zIIP LPAR capacity which is always available based on the zIIP LPAR weight integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - gr_flags

item.title: Field - gr_nontso_sessions_routed
item.description: Number of non-TSO sessions routed to system named in SMF99_GR_SYSNAME Map: SMF99_S1_GR_MAP Based on: SMF99_GR_NONTSO_SESSIONS_ROUTED Description Number of non-TSO sessions routed to system named in SMF99_GR_SYSNAME

item.title: Field - gr_service_by_importance
item.description: A single entry in the array of Importance Level Service Units, containing the number of Service Units consumed by work at this Importance Level (or unused) over the last ten seconds. The entries are indexed with an origin of zero so that the index matches the Importance Level to which the entry pertains. Index of zero corresponds to system work and index of 7 to unused capacity. Map: SMF99_S1_GR_MAP Array Length: 8

item.title: Field - gr_shortage
item.description: SMF99_GR_SYSNAME had a shortage that may have caused sessions not to be routed to it Map: SMF99_S1_GR_MAP Based on: gr_flags Description SMF99_GR_SYSNAME had a shortage that may have caused sessions not to be routed to it Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field gr_flags.

item.title: Field - hd_action_explanation
item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_action_explanation = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_action_explanation = hd_action_explanation.

item.title: Field - hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity
item.description: Less than 25% of CP free, no unparking Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: mvs_busy, vcm_mvsbusythrunpark, cec_free_capacity Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: condition1 = mvs_busy >= vcm_mvsbusythrunpark condition2 = cec_free_capacity <= (2e6 * vcm_mvsbusythrunpark / 1600) return condition1 & condition2

One VL is parked Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return vcm_diagdecreffectsmall & vcm_diagdecrdiscrpark & vcm_diagdecrdiscrparequ

item.description: Action taken by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S12_HD_INT_CAP_MAP Based on: hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity, hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl, hd_action_unpark, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity, hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping, hd_action_unpark_capping, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low, hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping, hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used, hd_action_park_small_utilization, hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping, hd_action_park, hd_action_park_capping Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: hd_action_unpark_filter = ~hd_action_unpark hd_action_unpark_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_capping hd_action_park_filter= ~hd_action_park hd_action_park_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_capping hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_free_capacity hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl_filter= ~hd_action_no_unparking_no_vl hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping_filter= ~hd_action_unpark_no_free_capacity_capping hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_mvs_busy_low_capping hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less4_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used_filter= ~hd_action_park_less10_guaranteed_used hd_action_park_small_utilization_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping_filter= ~hd_action_park_small_utilization_capping hd_request = hd_action_unpark.where(hd_action_unpark, '') hd_request = hd_request.where(hd_action_unpark_filter, 'Unpark') hd_request = hd_request.

item.title: Sample - hiper_dispatch
item.description: Request hiper dispatch information per processor type. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format vcm_projvhmutil SMF99C_VCM_PROJVHMUTIL Projected VH utilization (or projected VM utilization if there is no VH in the topology) if one VL would have been parked integer vcm_mvsbusydynathrunpark processed SMF99C_VCM_MVSBUSYDYNATHRUNPARK Dynamic MvsBusy threshhold for unparking scaled by 16 integer lpar_busy virtual lpar_capacity_used cpu_total Used LPAR capacity in microseconds, adjusted to the scheduled VCM inte… lpar_capacity_guaranteed SMF99C_VCM_LPARCAPGUARAN Guaranteed LPAR capcacity in microseconds.

For discretionary periods the name will be of the form $SRMDIxx.

item.title: Sample - p_num_online
item.description: Request number of CPs, zIIPs and zAAPs online. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format cp_online SMF99_CPUS_ONLINE Number of regular CPs online integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter). string timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp zaap_online SMF99_IFAS_ONLINE Number of online assist processors integer ziip_online SMF99_SUPS_ONLINE Number of online SUP processors integer

item.title: Sample - p_utilization
item.description: Request CP, zIIP, zAAP and total utilization. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format ziip_util processed SMF99_SUPA Average Utilization of SUP processors, scaled by 16 integer total_util processed SMF99_CPUIFAA Average utilization of regular CPs and assist processors, scaled by 16 integer zaap_util processed SMF99_IFAA Average Utilization of assist processors, scaled by 16 integer cp_util processed SMF99_CPUA Average utilization of regular CPs, scaled by 16 integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Sample - page_ins_and_uic
item.description: Request page-in rate count and UIC bucket information. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format uic4 SMF99_UIC4 Frames in uic bucket 4 integer uic3 SMF99_UIC3 Frames in uic bucket 3 integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter). string timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp uic2 SMF99_UIC2 Frames in uic bucket 2 integer page_ins SMF99_PGINS Page-ins rate count used for calculating the system paging rate integer uic1 SMF99_UIC1 Frames in uic bucket 1 - The central and expanded UIC buckets contain a count of frames that have not been referenced for specified periods of time.

item.title: Field - pflg
item.description: Record flags Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PFLG Description Record flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description record_incomplete 0 Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte reasm_indicator 1 Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area.

item.title: Field - processor
item.description: processor type Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: high, medium, low Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: high_filter = ~high medium_filter = ~medium low_filter = ~low processor = high.where(high, '') processor = processor.where(high_filter, 'High') processor = processor.where(medium_filter, 'Medium') processor = processor.where(low_filter, 'Low') return processor

item.title: Field - pserver_type
item.description: Server type. No bits will be on if period is not a server Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: SMF99_PSERVER_TYPE Description Server type. No bits will be on if period is not a server Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ptrans_server 0 Server is a transaction server penclave_server 1 Server is a enclave server pqueue_server 2 Server is a queue server

item.title: Field - pserver_type_name
item.description: Server type name Map: SMF99_S2_PER_MAP Based on: pserver_type Post-Processed This field is processed using the core.flagmap post-processor.

item.description: storage isolation target for next policy interval for each address space in period, valid only for work with short response time goals, zero otherwise. Frame count. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PSITAR Description storage isolation target for next policy interval for each address space in period, valid only for work with short response time goals, zero otherwise. Frame count.

item.title: Field - qdata_achieved_qmpl
item.description: average number (over policy interval) of server instances that are in swapped in spaces in the DISP. Only counts server instances serving the external service classs associated with the queue. Scaled by * 16. Not used for batch queue servers. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_ACHIEVED_QMPL Description average number (over policy interval) of server instances that are in swapped in spaces in the DISP. Only counts server instances serving the external service classs associated with the queue.

item.title: Field - qdata_active_qmpl
item.description: average of numer of server instance between Begin and End during policy interval. Scaled by * 16. For batch queue servers this is the number of initiators with active jobs sysplex wide. @WLMCBAT. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_ACTIVE_QMPL Description average of numer of server instance between Begin and End during policy interval. Scaled by * 16. For batch queue servers this is the number of initiators with active jobs sysplex wide.

item.title: Field - qdata_active_rgnwork
item.description: Current active number of server processing work requests which have been. routed directly to the server region. This number is neither included in the idle nor the active server count. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_ACTIVE_RGNWORK Description Current active number of server processing work requests which have been. routed directly to the server region. This number is neither included in the idle nor the active server count.

item.title: Field - qdata_ae_maxlimit
item.description: Maximum number of servers for the application environment. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_AE_MAXLIMIT Description Maximum number of servers for the application environment.

item.title: Field - qdata_ae_minlimit
item.description: Minimum number of servers for the application environment. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_AE_MINLIMIT Description Minimum number of servers for the application environment.

item.title: Field - qdata_ae_spreadmin
item.description: Minimum number of address spaces must be ditributed across all work queues of the application environment Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: qdata_q_qualifier Description Minimum number of address spaces must be ditributed across all work queues of the application environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field qdata_q_qualifier.

item.title: Field - qdata_as_capacity
item.description: Address space server instance capacity Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_AS_CAPACITY Description Address space server instance capacity

item.title: Field - qdata_avg_ineligible_requests
item.description: Average number of ineligible queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16. Currently applies to batch queues only. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_AVG_INELIGIBLE_REQUESTS Description Average number of ineligible queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16. Currently applies to batch queues only.

item.title: Field - qdata_avg_queued_requests
item.description: Average number of queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16 Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_AVG_QUEUED_REQUESTS Description Average number of queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16

item.title: Field - qdata_batch
item.description: Batch type work queue Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: qdata_q_type Description Batch type work queue Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field qdata_q_type.

item.title: Field - qdata_env_name
item.description: associated environment name for the queue Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_ENV_NAME Description associated environment name for the queue

item.title: Field - qdata_inst_per_server
item.description: Number of server instances per server. Only applies if SMF99_QDATA _TASKS_MANAGED is set Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_INST_PER_SERVER Description Number of server instances per server. Only applies if SMF99_QDATA _TASKS_MANAGED is set

item.title: Field - qdata_lt_total_requests
item.description: Long term average total requests (queued + active) scaled by Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_LT_TOTAL_REQUESTS Description Long term average total requests (queued + active) scaled by

item.title: Field - qdata_q_qualifier
item.description: Work Queue Qualifier Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_Q_QUALIFIER Description Work Queue Qualifier Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qdata_tasks_managed 0 Server instances are managed by WLM qdata_spaces_moved_by_hsk 1 Address spaces have been moved from this work queue to enforce the minimum number of servers of another work queue of the same application environment qdata_spaces_moved_by_pa 2 Address spaces have been moved during policy adjustment because the maximum number of servers has been already started for the application environment qdata_ae_spreadmin 3 Minimum number of address spaces must be ditributed across all work queues of the application environment

item.title: Field - qdata_q_type
item.description: Type byte Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_Q_TYPE Description Type byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qdata_queue_manager 0 queue manager type work queue qdata_batch 1 Batch type work queue

item.title: Field - qdata_qmpl_in_tar
item.description: Number of address spaces suggested to be started in the DISP on behalf of the period represented by this subtype 2. Does not apply to batch queue servers. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_QMPL_IN_TAR Description Number of address spaces suggested to be started in the DISP on behalf of the period represented by this subtype 2. Does not apply to batch queue servers.

item.title: Field - qdata_queue_manager
item.description: queue manager type work queue Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: qdata_q_type Description queue manager type work queue Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field qdata_q_type.

item.title: Field - qdata_rqdata_ln
item.description: Length of remote queue data entries Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_RQDATA_LN Description Length of remote queue data entries

item.title: Field - qdata_rqdata_of
item.description: Offset to remote queue data section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only applies to batch queue server Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_RQDATA_OF Description Offset to remote queue data section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only applies to batch queue server

item.title: Field - qdata_rqdata_on
item.description: Number of remote queue data entries Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_RQDATA_ON Description Number of remote queue data entries

item.title: Field - qdata_server_active
item.description: Current actual number of server instances bound to the queue and between Begin and End. This is a subset of the Have count. Have minus Active equals Idle. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SERVER_ACTIVE Description Current actual number of server instances bound to the queue and between Begin and End. This is a subset of the Have count. Have minus Active equals Idle.

item.title: Field - qdata_server_class_name
item.description: class name of disp serving the period represented by this subtype 2 record. Only applies to queue manager type servers. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SERVER_CLASS_NAME Description class name of disp serving the period represented by this subtype 2 record. Only applies to queue manager type servers.

item.title: Field - qdata_server_have
item.description: Current actual number of server instances bound to the queue. This is a queue wide count. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SERVER_HAVE Description Current actual number of server instances bound to the queue. This is a queue wide count.

item.title: Field - qdata_server_idle
item.description: Average idle server instances over policy interval Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SERVER_IDLE Description Average idle server instances over policy interval

item.title: Field - qdata_server_want
item.description: Number of server instances needed to address queue delay according to policy adjustment. This is a queue wide count. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SERVER_WANT Description Number of server instances needed to address queue delay according to policy adjustment. This is a queue wide count.

item.title: Field - qdata_spaces_moved
item.description: Number of server address spaces moved away from this queue. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SPACES_MOVED Description Number of server address spaces moved away from this queue.

item.title: Field - qdata_spaces_moved_by_hsk
item.description: Address spaces have been moved from this work queue to enforce the minimum number of servers of another work queue of the same application environment Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: qdata_q_qualifier Description Address spaces have been moved from this work queue to enforce the minimum number of servers of another work queue of the same application environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field qdata_q_qualifier.

item.title: Field - qdata_spaces_moved_by_pa
item.description: Address spaces have been moved during policy adjustment because the maximum number of servers has been already started for the application environment Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: qdata_q_qualifier Description Address spaces have been moved during policy adjustment because the maximum number of servers has been already started for the application environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field qdata_q_qualifier.

item.title: Field - qdata_subsys_name
item.description: Subsystem name of owner of the queue. Only applies to batch queue servers. Map: SMF99_QDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_QDATA_SUBSYS_NAME Description Subsystem name of owner of the queue. Only applies to batch queue servers.

item.title: Field - qdata_subsys_type

item.title: Sample - response_time
item.description: Request sampling information for response time distribution. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format prtp SMF99_PRTP Response time goal percentile. Zero if period does not have a percentile response time goal. integer rt_distri_num_trans[16] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[11] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[1] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer srv_class_name SMF99_CNAM service class name string rt_distri_num_trans[9] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer period_num SMF99_PNUM period number integer rt_distri_num_trans[10] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[23] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[24] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_int_sum_trans SMF99_RT_DISTRI_INT_SUM_TRANS Response time distribution total number of transactions completed during last interval integer rt_distri_avg_resp_time SMF99_RT_DISTRI_AVG_RESP_TIME Response time distribution average response time integer rt_distri_sum_trans SMF99_RT_DISTRI_SUM_TRANS Response time distribution total number of transactions completed integer rt_distri_num_trans[21] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[17] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[20] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer rt_distri_num_trans[27] array SMF99_RT_DISTRI_NUM_TRANS Response time distribution, 28 buckets integer sid SMF99SID System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - rg_capacity
item.description: Unit resource group capacity is specified in Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Post-Processed This field is processed using the core.flagmap post-processor.

item.title: Sample - rg_capping
item.description: Request for RG and TRG capping data. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format rg_mem_fixed_frames_4k SMF99_RG_MEM_FIXED_FRAMES_4K Amount of fixed frames in a memory pool nomalized to 4K frames. integer rg_isp virtual rg_flags Indicates that specialty processor consumption is included in the group consumption max_sr SMF99_MAX_SR Maximum service rate for the group (FFFFFFFF if not specified in the policy) integer rg_mem_shortage_flags processed SMF99_RG_MEM_SHORTAGE_FLAGS Memory Pool shortage flags.

item.title: Field - rg_flags
item.description: resource group flags Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_FLAGS Description resource group flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rg_is_dynamic 0 Indicates that the resource group is a dynamic resource group rg_percent_capped 1 Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of the total LPAR capacity rg_percent_single_processor 2 Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of a single processor capacity rg_msu_per_hour 3 Indicates that the resource group capacity is specified in MSU/h rg_raw_sus 4 Indicates that the resource group capacity is specified in raw service units rg_isp 5 Indicates that specialty processor consumption is included in the group consumption rg_trg 6 Indicates that the resource group is a tenant resource group rg_hwc 7 Indicates that the tenant resource group is enabled for zCBP

item.title: Field - rg_framecnt
item.description: Tenant resource group’s aggregated ammount of storage frames (4K+1M+2G, normalized to 4K). Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_FRAMECNT Description Tenant resource group’s aggregated ammount of storage frames (4K+1M+2G, normalized to 4K). Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON

item.title: Field - rg_hwc
item.description: Indicates that the tenant resource group is enabled for zCBP Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that the tenant resource group is enabled for zCBP Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_is_dynamic
item.description: Indicates that the resource group is a dynamic resource group Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that the resource group is a dynamic resource group Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_isp
item.description: Indicates that specialty processor consumption is included in the group consumption Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that specialty processor consumption is included in the group consumption Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_lacs
item.description: Tenant resource group long-term average of CPU service in MSU/h. Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_LACS Description Tenant resource group long-term average of CPU service in MSU/h. Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON

item.title: Field - rg_lacs_zcbp
item.description: Tenant resource group long-term average of zCBP service in MSU/h. Only valid if SMF99_RG_HWC is ON Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_LACS_ZCBP Description Tenant resource group long-term average of zCBP service in MSU/h. Only valid if SMF99_RG_HWC is ON

item.title: Field - rg_mem_backed_2g_frames
item.description: Number of backed 2G (fixed) frames in the memory pool. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_BACKED_2G_FRAMES Description Number of backed 2G (fixed) frames in the memory pool.

item.title: Field - rg_mem_discretionary_2g
item.description: Amount of available discretionary memory in 2G frames. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_DISCRETIONARY_2G Description Amount of available discretionary memory in 2G frames.

item.title: Field - rg_mem_discretionary_4k
item.description: Amount of available disrectionary memory normalized to 4K frames. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_DISCRETIONARY_4K Description Amount of available disrectionary memory normalized to 4K frames.

item.title: Field - rg_mem_fixed_frames_4k
item.description: Amount of fixed frames in a memory pool nomalized to 4K frames. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_FIXED_FRAMES_4K Description Amount of fixed frames in a memory pool nomalized to 4K frames.

item.title: Field - rg_mem_limit
item.description: Maximum memory limit for resource group in Gigabytes Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_LIMIT Description Maximum memory limit for resource group in Gigabytes

item.title: Field - rg_mem_shortage_flags
item.description: Memory Pool shortage flags. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_SHORTAGE_FLAGS Description Memory Pool shortage flags. Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 No Shortage 192 Available Frame Shortage 160 Pageable Storage Shortage 224 Available + Pageable Shortage

item.title: Field - rg_mem_usage_4k
item.description: Amount of memory used by a memory pool normalized to 4K frames. Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEM_USAGE_4K Description Amount of memory used by a memory pool normalized to 4K frames.

item.title: Field - rg_memsmpcnt
item.description: Number of times storage frames were sampled in SMF99_RG_FRAMECNT Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_MEMSMPCNT Description Number of times storage frames were sampled in SMF99_RG_FRAMECNT

item.title: Field - rg_msu_per_hour
item.description: Indicates that the resource group capacity is specified in MSU/h Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that the resource group capacity is specified in MSU/h Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_perc_max
item.description: Percentage max value, if min/max specified in percentages. Or MSU max value if min/max specified in MSU Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_PERC_MAX Description Percentage max value, if min/max specified in percentages. Or MSU max value if min/max specified in MSU

item.description: Percentage min value, if min/max specified in percentages. Or MSU min value if min/max specified in MSU Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_PERC_MIN Description Percentage min value, if min/max specified in percentages. Or MSU min value if min/max specified in MSU

item.title: Field - rg_percent_capped
item.description: Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of the total LPAR capacity Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of the total LPAR capacity Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_percent_single_processor
item.description: Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of a single processor capacity Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: rg_flags Description Indicates that the resource group is capacity is specified in percentage of a single processor capacity Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field rg_flags.

item.title: Field - rg_raw_sus

item.title: Field - rg_susifa
item.description: Tenant resource group’s aggregated IFA service units. Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON Map: SMF99_S1_RG_MAP Based on: SMF99_RG_SUSIFA Description Tenant resource group’s aggregated IFA service units. Only valid if SMF99_RG_TRG is ON

item.title: Field - rg_total_sr
item.description: Total service rate. If the min/max values are specified as percentages, the service rate represents only the local system. Otherwise the service rate of the sysplex. Otherwise the service rate of the sysplex.

item.description: 10-second average number of active servers scaled by * 16 Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_ACTIVE_SERVERS Description 10-second average number of active servers scaled by * 16

item.description: Originator sent valid assess data Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description Originator sent valid assess data Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_avg_constraint_requests
item.description: average number of queued requests with affinity to constraint systems only scaled by * 16 Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_AVG_CONSTRAINT_REQUESTS Description average number of queued requests with affinity to constraint systems only scaled by * 16

item.title: Field - rqdata_avg_ineligible_requests
item.description: average number of ineligible queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16 Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_AVG_INELIGIBLE_REQUESTS Description average number of ineligible queued requests over a policy interval scaled by * 16

item.description: Average total requests for the queue eligible to run on the system respresented by this RQDATA entry. This corresponds to the last point plotted on the queue delay plot. Scaled by * 16. Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_AVG_TOTAL_REQ Description Average total requests for the queue eligible to run on the system respresented by this RQDATA entry. This corresponds to the last point plotted on the queue delay plot. Scaled by * 16.

item.title: Field - rqdata_cannot_start_server
item.description: This system cannot start any servers for this work queue due to some constraint Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description This system cannot start any servers for this work queue due to some constraint Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_count_servers
item.description: Number of servers required for receiver value Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_#_SERVERS Description Number of servers required for receiver value

item.title: Field - rqdata_deferred_start_server
item.description: This system wanted to add servers for this work queue on the just-completed policy interval, but deferred since another system appears to be a better candidate. Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description This system wanted to add servers for this work queue on the just-completed policy interval, but deferred since another system appears to be a better candidate. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_deferred_starting_server
item.description: This system wanted to add servers for this work queue on the just-completed policy interval, but deferred since another system appears to be a better candidate. Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description This system wanted to add servers for this work queue on the just-completed policy interval, but deferred since another system appears to be a better candidate. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_donor_class
item.description: Class name for donor period most impacted by starting servers Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_DONOR_CLASS Description Class name for donor period most impacted by starting servers

item.title: Field - rqdata_donor_rgroup
item.description: resource group name for donor period most impacted by starting servers Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_DONOR_RGROUP Description resource group name for donor period most impacted by starting servers

item.title: Field - rqdata_flags
item.description: flags Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_FLAGS Description flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rqdata_just_started_server 0 This system started at least one server for this work queue in the policy interval that this data represents rqdata_cannot_start_server 1 This system cannot start any servers for this work queue due to some constraint rqdata_deferred_start_server 2 This system wanted to add servers for this work queue on the just-completed policy interval, but deferred since another system appears to be a better candidate.

item.title: Field - rqdata_highest_imp
item.description: Highest importance of donor periods negatively affected if servers are started Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_RQDATA_HIGHEST_IMP Description Highest importance of donor periods negatively affected if servers are started

item.title: Field - rqdata_just_started_server
item.description: This system started at least one server for this work queue in the policy interval that this data represents Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description This system started at least one server for this work queue in the policy interval that this data represents Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_managed
item.description: Work queue is managed on this system Map: SMF99_RQDATA_MAP Based on: rqdata_flags Description Work queue is managed on this system Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field rqdata_flags.

item.title: Field - rqdata_percount

item.title: Field - rqdata_pi_delta

item.title: Field - rqdata_q_skip

item.title: Field - rqdata_q_skip_reason

item.title: Field - rqdata_sys_name

item.title: Field - sdata_batch
item.description: Server is a batch work queue Map: SMF99_SDATA_MAP Based on: sdata__server_type Description Server is a batch work queue Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field sdata__server_type.

item.description: aux private paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space Map: SMF99_SDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_SDATA_ENC_AUXP Description aux private paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space

item.description: aux standard hiperspace paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space Map: SMF99_SDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_SDATA_ENC_HSP Description aux standard hiperspace paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space

item.description: aux VIO paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space Map: SMF99_SDATA_MAP Based on: SMF99_SDATA_ENC_VIO Description aux VIO paging delay samples experienced by enclave work units known to be associated with an address space

item.description: Offset to server section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only valid if period is a server period. There will be one server section entry for each different external service class that server address spaces in this server period were originally classified to. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_SERVER_DATA_OF Description Offset to server section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only valid if period is a server period. There will be one server section entry for each different external service class that server address spaces in this server period were originally classified to.

item.description: PERIOD NUMBER WITH IN CLASS Map: SMF99_S6_SERVER_MAP Based on: SMF99_S6_SERVER_PER_NUM Description PERIOD NUMBER WITH IN CLASS

item.description: Period number Map: SMF99_SERVER_MAP Based on: SMF99_SERVER_PNUM Description Period number

item.description: Real storage shortage exists Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: short_flags Description Real storage shortage exists Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field short_flags.

item.title: Field - short_flags
item.description: shortage flags Map: SMF99_S1_SS_MAP Based on: SMF99_SHORT_FLAGS Description shortage flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description short 0 Real storage shortage exists asm1 1 First level Aux shortage exists ams2 2 Critical Aux shortage exists sqa1 3 First level SQA shortage exists sqa2 4 Critical SQA shortage exists

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: System identification (from the SID parameter). Record: SMF99S1 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.description: System identification (from the SID parameter). Record: SMF99S12 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.description: System identification (from the SID parameter). Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).
